thread.title: How long will you live for? Take the test to discover your 'heart age'
thread.title_full: How long will you live for? Take the test to discover your 'heart age'

author: Mark Molloy
title: How long will you live for? Take the test to discover your 'heart age'
text:
I f it was possible to see how long you will live, would you like to know the answer?
A new life expectancy study shows many people are likely to live beyond 90 by 2030 , but what are the lifestyle changes you can make today to ensure you live a healthier and longer life?
Immortality or returning in the future as a half man, half machine cyborg may be sci-fi fantasy, but improving your ‘heart age’ could at least help you live a little longer.
A heart calculator, released by the NHS last year , tells individuals how much longer they could live by making certain lifestyle changes, like losing weight or quitting smoking. 
“Knowing your heart age is vital to taking control of your health. Armed with this knowledge you can start to make changes to help protect yourself,” explained Dr Mike Knapton, associate medical director at the British Heart Foundation.
Take the test below to see the difference certain lifestyle changes can make to your ‘heart age’ At a glance | Heart attacks: Symptoms and treatment
